member.name: P:DEFCON_CORE.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:DEFCON_CORE.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:DEFCON_CORE.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: M:DEFCON_CORE.CORE.SMS_SEND(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Allows the DEFCON client to send the user a text message.

member.name: M:DEFCON_CORE.CORE.LOCKDOWN(System.Boolean)
member.summary: LOCKDOWN allows the DEFCON client to enable and disable the current user's internet connection. This is useful when attempting to inhibit the transmission of malicious traffic whilst destroying the malware.
member.param: TRUE = Disable Internet Connection | FALSE = Enable Internet Connection

member.name: M:DEFCON_CORE.CORE.SPEAKTOCLIENT(System.String@)
member.summary: Allows the DEFCON client to "Talk" to the user via speech synthesis.
member.param: The text you want the client to "say"
